casebody.data:
NATIONSTAR MORTGAGE, LLC, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Rodney LEE, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
RCL Management, Black Wall Street, LLC, and Shimeese Posey, Defendants. C-656 September Term 2017
080151 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 9, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005232-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
